name: Necromancer Rush
description:
A spell has gone wrong and demons are rising from the underworld. slash, freeze, and kill the demons rushing toward you in this fast paced dungeon game.

use WASD keys to move the Necromancer

Press the E key to teleport to your mouse as a fast escape

move your mouse to rotate the staff and freeze the enemies

P.S if you die you have to refresh the page to play again

Music by mattRlive
